about_the_game:
◆Introduction


Real-time 3D touch discipline clicker game.
Hoshikawa Luna , the most beautiful girl at the university.
After tireless efforts, you finally managed to hypnotise her and take her back to your secret basement.
Lock up the proud and unbeatable girl and play the most erotic game ever!

◆Gameplay System


Easy operation with a single mouse click. Using erotic toys can make discipline much more efficient!!
Once she's chained and locked up, you can train her to your heart's content!
The efficiency of your discipline will increase by leaps and bounds after you buy the sex props with the money you earn!
Purchasing certain products may cause H events...?
As the discipline progresses, she gradually...

◆Dress up function


Discipline is affected by costume changes!
Clothing and accessories purchased in the store can be changed at any time during discipline.
Maid costume, cat ears, eye masks and more...
Dress her in your favorite outfit and enjoy the thrill of doing whatever you want♪.
The Tits Adjustment feature allows you to adjust the size of her breasts anytime, anywhere, making it easy for you to switch between large and small breasts!

◆Auto mode is equipped for automatic discipline!


Automatic discipline is possible by setting the auto mode and background playback function!
Free your hands and enjoy watching her get disciplined!

◆Equipped with a camera view mode that offers a high degree of freedom


Adjust the camera view to your preferred angle and position in Discipline H!
You can enjoy watching the girl react from different angles whenever you want!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts , extreme violence, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, General Mature Content, BDSM, drug abuse.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: Dark Dominance ~Chain Control~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit OS - Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit OS - Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 / RX 5700
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: "Hoshikawa Luna" is the most beautiful girl at the university. To get this beautiful and proud girl, you keep trying every day.... Finally, the hypnosis app was ready. Having successfully hypnotised her, you have taken her to your secret basement. Tie her up in chains for some erotic discipline!
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
